name: Vishal K.S
title: Engineer and Builder
bio:
I'm Vishal, a backend engineer in San Francisco. I'm all about learning, building, and working on complex engineering problems. I love pushing my brain to its limits on the daily.
 I grew up in Bangalore, India, and now I'm in the US, working on something interesting at Bestever. If you're working on something dope and need an extra hand, or if you're part of a startup, hit me up. Let's link up over some boba or coffee and talk.
